119th Congress District-Level Data (Demo: Median_HH_Income                                       Estimated Median Household Income Based off of Estimated Income Range Counts (2022 ACS)
BACH_PLUS_pct                                          Estimated Percent of 25+ Population with Bachelor's Degree or Higher (2022 ACS)

ENG_LW_pct                                             Estimated Population Speaking English "Less Than Very Well"

Block-level population data from the 2020 P.L. census data release was gathered for every state and then aggregated to the 119th Congressional Districts using a block-assignment file.
2022 ACS household income was originally available at the block-group level and consists of counts of households in the following income ranges: <10k
column14: 150k-200k and 200k+. This data was disaggregated from the block group level to the block-level based one each block's share of the total number of occupied housing units within the block group
column15: resulting in an estimate of household counts in each of the ranges of incomes in each block. These counts are then aggregated up to the district-level using a block-assignment file. An estimated median income value was also calculated
column16: based on the counts of households in each category is present above. For example
column17: if a district had 2.2 households between 20-25k
column19: the median would be 35-40k. Ties go to the lower range. All values are in 2022 inflation-adjusted dollars.

119th Congress District-Level Data (Demo: â€‹Language and foreign born population data was first disaggregated from the tract level to the block-level using total population at the block
Economic: and education was disaggregated from the block-group level to the block level using 25+ population. For all ACS data disaggregations
Language and Partisan): if there were any cases were there was data at the block group / tract in the data to disaggregate but not in the PL data with which I was creating a ratio
column4: values were disaggregated proportionally across the relevant geography.

119th Congress District-Level Data (Demo: Election results data was initially retrieved from Voting Election Science Team (VEST) and disaggregated to the block-level using each block's population of non-incarcerated voting-age population. This data was joined to a block-assignment file and aggregated to the district-level.

Economic: data was all aggregated to the 119th Congressional Districts using a block-assignment file.

119th Congress District-Level Data (Demo: Any blocks that are not assigned to a district have 0 total population and are filtered out of the final file.
Please note that some states used adjusted population data when drawing their congressional districts (https://redistrictingdatahub.org/reports/states-that-adjust-the-census-data-for-redistricting/)
Economic: the data in this file is unadjusted
column4: district-population deviations based on total population may be incorrect.
